GitHub 在新窗口打开

Get Started

This is a normal page, which contains VuePress basics.

Pages

You can add markdown files in your vuepress directory, every markdown file will be converted to a page in your site.

See routing在新窗口打开 for more details.

Content

Every markdown file will be rendered to HTML, then converted to a Vue SFC在新窗口打开.

VuePress support basic markdown syntax and some extensions在新窗口打开, you can also use Vue features在新窗口打开 in it.

Configuration

VuePress use a .vuepress/config.js(or .ts) file as site configuration在新窗口打开, you can use it to config your site.

For client side configuration在新窗口打开, you can create .vuepress/client.js(or .ts).

Meanwhile, you can also add configuration per page with frontmatter在新窗口打开.

Layouts and customization

Here are common configuration controlling layout of @vuepress/theme-default:

  • navbar在新窗口打开
  • sidebar在新窗口打开

Check default theme docs在新窗口打开 for full reference.

You can add extra style在新窗口打开 with .vuepress/styles/index.scss file.

Edit this page on GitHub 在新窗口打开
